data_description.system: System the webhooks should be set up for

choose_system.description: Please select the Ekey Bionyx system in which you want to set up the webhooks

webhooks.description: Please name your webhooks. You can set up to 5 webhooks. Leaving a name empty will skip the setup of that webhook.

data_description.url: Home Assistant instance URL which can be reached from the fingerprint controller

delete_webhooks.description: Webhook configuration inconsistent. Webhooks with Home Assistant were already configured. If you continue they will be marked for removal.

progress.check_deletion_status: Please go to the ekey Bionyx app and confirm the deletion of the webhooks. This may take a few minutes.

abort.no_available_webhooks: There are no available webhooks in the ekey Bionyx plattform. Please delete some and try again.
abort.no_own_systems: Your account does not have admin access to any systems
abort.cannot_connect: Connection to ekey Bionyx failed. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
